posts.post_content: This lot is 24 t206's in vg/ex+ - ex+ condition.  Every card has a small erased pencil mark on the front lower left corner.  They are mostly the players position.  Hardly a crease in the bunch.  All backs are common and clean.  Let's start with $40 each(Chase $100).  3 for $100 or $750 (including Chase) for the lot.  Paypal money owed, money order.   [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]
